title: i think we need a dinosaur champion
body: his q is a bite that scales  of arm pene and can crit too his w has 2 part to it the roar and the scratch the roar is scales  from ap  and the scratch scales from ap and leave a mark after attacking that mark will do more damage but the marks go away in 3 sec his e is charge gaining movement speed and attack speed and his r is smell of the blood it give him more attack speed and rage his can smell his targets. The utl last for  10 sec his passive tough skin his gains 10 arm every time his get damage stack to 5 and the passive goes off if he does get attack plz make this champion

replies.body:
Pretty sure we already have something that resembles the concept of dinosaurs,

His name is Cho'gath.
And a prehistoric Cho'gath skin which looks somewhat like a dinosaur.
we also have a prehistoric themed champion known as gnar

The grammar is strong with this one. 

{{champion:64}}
